channel.title: Interface Text Clicking Offset
channel.description: Hi everyone! I've added an awt MenuBar to my client and moved the game window down so that the menubar didn't cover it up and moved all the main interfaces click offset as well. I've come across one small bug with the chat window interfaces such as "Click here to continue" and "Choose an option:" interfaces that didnt offset correctly. If anyone might be able to give me some pointers that would be nice. I am done with the client version and this bug is the only thing keeping me from uploading it. I am using deltascape v11 client and what I've done so far is in Applet_Sub1 in the following methods: mousePressed(), nouseDragged(), mouseMoved(). Anyways, is there any other place that deals with chat window interfaces?
